level.heading: Prohibited names.
level.text: The Mayor may refuse to issue, renew, or transfer a license in a name that:
Is misleading or would constitute false advertising;
Implies a partnership, association, or corporation when a partnership, association, or corporation does not exist;
Includes the name of a salesperson;
Is a name which has been used by any person whose license has been suspended;
Includes the name of a person not otherwise licensed; or
Is a name which is deceptively similar to a name used by any other licensee.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-261
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-261, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 47-2801.
